Content:
[telegram] <mo7881> This is HUGE! Will this work for other blockchains that are secured by KMD DPOW ? (re @yorklab: Some interesting posts from JL777 about the impact to Komodo (and KMD) from his new discovery today:
"getting notarized SPV security at API wallet speeds
basically the best of both worlds
both speed and security can be achieved. essentially nSPV node would be very very close security model as a full node would be"
"you tell me. it applies only to komodo based chains that are dPoW notarized
it wont work with non-dPoW chains"
"yes, 1000 chains wanting dPoW is not so crazy and if each buys 10k KMD so they cover annual notarization costs via the rewards...
it is a big if, but at least in the realm of possible, if we can get a lot of ecosystem projects")

Content: additional work would be needed to add nSPV extensions into the daemon

Author: jl777c#5810

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: so possible, but would require more work on the daemon

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: since truly decentralized cross chain atomic swaps cant be stopped (short of stopping all users), the latest regulation guidelines specifically say that non-custodial DEX is not subject to money transmittor licenses. the proxy based DEX does not appear to have the same status

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: when we add support for PIRATE to atomicDEX...

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [telegram] <Lennart> what would be the way to anonymize funds using Pirate? Is it enough to do just a z-z transaction? Or should multiple z-addresses be generated and smaller chunks sent to each address?

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [telegram] <Lennart> Pirate in Atomic Dex would be very, very powerful indeed

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: necessarily the PIRATE swap will be via z -> t (swap p2sh) and t (swap p2sh) -> z, so the party you trade with will know the zaddress and amounts. that by itself wont do much good as zaddr are not onchain. however if you make exchange deposits or purchases via the same zaddress, then it become possible to correlate. so, swap only from a special zaddr that you use only for atomic swaps, then do a z -> z for all proceeds. that makes all the funds part of the giant anon set that is 20x more than ZEC anon set
